name: Modern Gamedev
description:
You will take on the role of an nft-crypto-blockchain tycoon who thought it would be nice to earn extra money on the currently hyped nft. It was decided to create a game. But after a large team of developers was assembled, a dysman came down to you and said that the NFT market would soon collapse. And I want to make money. Therefore, you have to create an artificial hype around your coin with the help of the dirtiest tricks in order to withdraw everything in one moment, leaving people with nothing.

You have 4 scales:

  1. Money
  2. Scamcoin cost
  3. Number of subscribers
  4. Lie scale

If one of the stats falls below a certain level, or the lie scale is filled to 100%, then you will lose. Conversely, if you achieve certain success, then the game will be completed.
